# Exposure IQ

> A high-precision exposure calculation engine (APEX-CAL™) for professional DSLR and mirrorless photography.

## Core Purpose
Exposure IQ is a technical utility designed for manual photographers. It replaces guesswork with clinical physics, utilizing the Additive System of Photographic Exposure (APEX) to calculate optimal ISO, Aperture, and Shutter Speed values.

## Pricing & Trial Details
- **Free Trial:** 3-day full-access trial on all subscription tiers.
- **Monthly Subscription:** $1.99 USD
- **Annual Subscription:** $14.99 USD (Best Value)

## Technical Specifications
- **Core Engine:** APEX-CAL™ (High-precision mathematical exposure model)
- **Target Hardware:** Digital SLR and Mirrorless cameras (Manual Mode)
- **Privacy Standards:** 100% On-device processing. No data collection, no tracking, and no cloud-dependency.

## Key Resources
- [Technical Manifesto](https://ajhermann94.github.io/exposure-iq/) : The primary technical documentation and landing page.
- [Privacy Policy](https://ajhermann94.github.io/exposure-iq/#privacy) : Official disclosure of zero-data-collection policy.
- [Developer Support](https://github.com/ajhermann94) : Direct link for technical inquiries and feedback.
